text.front:
BEFORE THE
MADURAI BENCH OF MADRAS HIGH COURT
DATED:
14.02.2020
CORAM:
THE
HONOURABLE MR.JUSTICE M.DURAISWAMY
AND
THE
HONOURABLE MR.JUSTICE T.RAVINDRAN
W.P(MD)No.3025 of 2020
and
W.M.P(MD)Nos.2553 & 2554 of 2020
R.Varathan
... Petitioner
Vs.
1.
The Zonal Deputy Tahsildar
,
Taluk Office,
Srirangam,
Tiruchirappalli.
2.
The Tahsildar
,
Taluk Office,
Srirrangam,
Tiruchirappalli.
3.
The District Revenue Officer
,
Collectorate,
Tiruchirappalli District,
Tiruchirappalli.
4.
The District Collector
,
Collectorate,
Tiruchirappalli District,
Tiruchirappalli.
... Respondents
PRAYER: Writ Petition filed under Article 226 of the Constitution of
India, to issue a Writ of Certiorarified Mandamus, to call for the
records of the impugned notice of the second respondent in
Aa3/6727/2013 dated 07.02.2020 and quash the same as illegal
. and ultravires and consequently direct the respondents to change
the patta in the name of the petitioner for the property comprised in
Survey No.2300, Block No.42, Ward 'C' of Thimmaraya Samuthiram
Village, Trichy District measuring 1.4445 sq.meter.
For Petitioner :
Mr.M.Ashok Kumar
For Respondents :
Mr.J.Gunaseelan Muthiah
,
Additional Government Pleader.
ORDER
